snippet.title: Somber Echoes - Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Official Release Date Trailer of Dark Fantasy Metroidvania Somber Echoes

Wishlist Somber Echoes here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1299290/Somber_Echoes/

Beat the monsters and solve the mysteries of the abandoned mothership floating in vast space to confront your twin sister and prevent her from unleashing a cosmic catastrophe. In this dark fantasy Metroidvania you must explore and find your way through the horrors and kill everything in your way.

SOMBER ECHOES SOCIALS
►Twitter: https://x.com/somberechoes
►Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/somberechoes/
►TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@somberechoes
►Discord: https://discord.gg/AGrWpa43yC

CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GAMES
►Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?publisher=Bonus%20Stage%20Publishing

#gaming #trailer #metroidvania 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
